description: Main source file of a Flutter-based online bookstore frontend, including theme setup, models, mock repository, and pages for browsing, product details, cart, checkout, and profile.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines Ocean Professional color palette and gradient used across the app.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Model representing a book with attributes like id, title, author, category, price, rating, coverUrl, description, featured.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents a cart item linking a Book with a quantity.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: Simulates API for fetching categories, featured books, search results, and individual book details.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: Manages search, filter, and sort state for book catalog.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: Manages shopping cart: add, remove, decrement, clear items.

classes.name: UserState
classes.description: Mock user profile state with name and email.

classes.name: BookStoreApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up providers and theme, and managing navigation.

classes.name: RootNav
classes.description: Bottom navigation widget for main sections: Home, Shop, Cart, Profile.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: Custom app bar with gradient background.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Displays featured books and a hero banner.

classes.name: CatalogPage
classes.description: Provides search, filters, sorting, and displays grid of books.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: UI component for displaying a book's summary in grid or list.

classes.name: BookDetailPage
classes.description: Full details of a selected book, with add to cart functionality.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: Displays cart items, allows quantity adjustments, shows total, and proceeds to checkout.

classes.name: CheckoutPage
classes.description: Mock purchase form, order summary, confirmation dialog, clears cart post-purchase.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: Displays user profile info, options, and logout.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for the Flutter app, runs BookStoreApp.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns ThemeData with custom color scheme and styles.
